tool_description: This app can be used to recognize 176 languages given one or more text sentences.
title: Language Identification

api_list.name: language-detection
api_list.description: Identifies which language is being used in the given 'text' string.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://language-identification4.p.rapidapi.com/prod/language-detection"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-identification4.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://language-identification4.p.rapidapi.com/prod/language-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-identification4.p.rapidapi.com"
